description: Google Cloud APIs Client Library for Node.js
name: gcloud

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --no-timeouts --bail test/**/*.js -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.lint: jshint lib/ system-test/ test/ && jscs lib/ system-test/ test/
scripts.test: npm run docs && mocha test/docs.js test/index.js test/*/*.js
